prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in marine biology.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the characteristics of the aquatic organism, please predict the major group it belongs to.
prompt.answer_prompt: Fish species[0], Crustaceans species[1], Molluscs species[2], Mammals species[3], Amphibians and Reptiles species[4], Aquatic invertebrates species[5], or Aquatic plants species[6]?
